body.p: New guide for upgrading to Gentoo Linux 1.4_rc1 without reinstalling! The Gentoo Linux documentation team has brought you yet another great document! Thanks to the work of Road_Runner, Humpback, and carpaski ( he wrote the scripts), we now have a preliminary update guide to help you upgrade your Gentoo 1.x system to Gentoo 1.4rc_1. (The process is a bit involved due to the C++ ABI changes between previous versions of gcc and gcc-3.2.) Please check it out, and happy hacking!
